title: Notifications
booking_request.title: New Booking Request
booking_request.message: {{clientName}} has requested a {{duration}}-minute {{sessionType}} session on {{date}} at {{time}}.
booking_confirmed.title: Booking Confirmed
booking_confirmed.message: Your {{duration}}-minute {{sessionType}} session with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been confirmed.
booking_declined.title: Booking Declined
booking_declined.message: Unfortunately, your {{sessionType}} session with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been declined.
booking_cancelled.title: Booking Cancelled
booking_cancelled.message: The {{sessionType}} session with {{name}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been cancelled.
session_reminder.title: Upcoming Session Reminder
session_reminder.message: Don't forget! Your {{sessionType}} session starts in {{reminderMinutes}} minutes at {{time}}.
session_starting.title: Session Starting Soon
session_starting.message: Get ready! Your {{sessionType}} session begins in {{timeUntilStart}} minutes.
session_starting_now.title: Session Starting Now
session_starting_now.message: It's time! Your {{sessionType}} session is starting now.
payment_confirmed.title: Payment Confirmed
payment_confirmed.message: Great news! Your payment of {{amount}} for the {{sessionType}} session on {{date}} has been confirmed.
payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.message: Oops! The payment of {{amount}} for your {{sessionType}} session on {{date}} failed. Please update your payment method.
empty: You're all caught up! No new notifications.
error: Oops! We couldn't load your notifications. Please try again.
